title: Biden reverses some Trump policies related to Cuba, making it easier for families to visit relatives in country - CNN
content:
1. Biden reverses some Trump policies related to Cuba, making it easier for families to visit relatives in country  CNN
  2. White House moves to loosen remittance, flight rules on Cuba  The Associated Press
  3. U.S. revises Cuba policy, eases restrictions on remittances, travel  Reuters Canada
  4. Biden reverses Trump policies related to Cuba, making it easier for families to visit relatives in country  CNN
  5. Biden reverses Trump policies on Cuba  WPLG Local 10
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The State Department on Monday announced a series of measures it said is aimed at supporting the Cuban people, including reinstating the Cuban Family Reunification Parole Program and increasing consular services and visa processing.
